name: Pirao (Manioc polenta)
keywords: fish broth, manioc flour, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the fish broth to a rapid boil, and stir in a little salt and pepper. Add the tomato paste, and stir to incorporate thoroughly. Sprinkle in the manioc flour, a little at a time, stirring vigorously and continuously until all the flour has been incorporated and the mixture has the consistency of soft ice cream. Serve immediately; like polenta, pirao gets stiffer the longer it sits.
